items.sentence: I don\'t think it\'s possible to do this without some help.
Tom wasn\'t surprised to hear that Mary had gotten married.
You\'d be amazed how much beer Tom drinks when he goes out.
A study showed that eating too fast contributes to obesity.
Both cars involved in the accident were completely totaled.
I get the feeling that no one here is telling us the truth.
I\'d completely forgotten that Tom used to be a vegetarian.
It would be better if we just kept doing what we\'re doing.
Even when she\'s not wearing makeup, she\'s very beautiful.
I didn\'t know Tom was the one who was supposed to do that.
